name: Faery Tales (win) - LD44
description:
Platformer where you play as a Faery fighting against Dwarves that have taken over her forest.

WASD to move, space to jump. Click & aim mouse to shoot. But each shot takes health so use sparingly.

Also moddable if you dont mind messing around with json files. Have fun!

Modding Guide: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/faery-tales/faery-tales-modding-guide

1.1 Changelog:

-Added zoom option for HD screens
-Fixed error when returning to menu
-Made changes to level 2, with a new way to complete the level.
-Changed Dwarf character so its way less floaty.
-Added jump grace period to make platforming better.
